note: Retired air traffic controller. Queer disabled feminist autistic Luddite. Intersectionality or GTFO.

name: I have worked on:
value: Chicks Dig Comics, Queers Dig TIme Lords, Fantastic Fangirls, Pretty Deadly, Apex Magazine, air traffic control at ZMP

name: What makes me disabled?
value: Well, my autoimmune system keeps trying to grow my throat closed. Also I have rheumatoid arthritis. Also my feet are permanently fucked up. Also I have a tracheostomy.

name: My favorite Kpop groups are:
value: Dreamcatcher, Pixy, (G)I-dle, La Sserafim, Stray Kids, Ateez, xikers, TXT
